Text:
Love to see you get bored more often, great job.
Thanks gonz30938

Love it!  NSFW, but perfect for home.  I love you passion :)  Thanks!  What is the best place to get a collection of my own?  I do some work myself, but would love to capture my sweeeethearts the way these profesionals do!  photogdaddyva@yahoo.com

@ photigdaddyva,

The best way would be to put an ad on something like Craigslist, offering you services in exchange for them getting all the proofs.  Make sure that if you're shooting under 17 that you get signed permission slips from a guardian.  Don't suggest the home-run shots right out of the gate, shoot what they are most comfortable with and the trust will grow, then you can suggest bathing suits, lingerie and whatever else.  Don't be a perv, and don't hurt these girls...or we'll kill you.
